arStrings.szText:
Found in {c_important}Tortured Gifts{/c} during the
{icon:Marker_Helltide, 2.5}{c_important}Helltide{/c} in World Tiers {icon:Icon_WorldTier_3, 2.0} and {icon:Icon_WorldTier_4, 2.0}. Occasionally found from other sources.

Used to improve {c_important}Sacred{/c} and {c_important}Ancestral{/c} items.
Is it a stone, an organ, or something else? Indescribably, it is all of these things.
